1.0.name: wordpress/comments-limit
1.0.description: This simple plugin lets you limit the number of comments on a particular post or for all of your posts. It has a simple admin interface that is very easy to use plus it puts a new field into the 'edit posts' area that lets you set the number of comments for a particular post.
